meaningMnemonic: A <radical>horse</radical> gets trapped in a small room with a <radical>stool</radical> and an <radical>insect</radical>, and together they create a very <kanji>boisterous</kanji> situation. The horse and the insect are both scrambling frantically to get out of the small room, knocking the stool around all over the place.
readingMnemonic: At the height of their <kanji>boisterous</kanji> sounds, there's a sudden, awful CRONCH(!) and you see the <reading>sou</reading>l (そう) of the insect slowly rising out of the room, through the ceiling.
